title: 1st purple chest gave a skin shard for a champion that I have never owned.
body:
Proof:
http://imgur.com/a/y4drm
http://imgur.com/a/9Uxxq
http://imgur.com/a/fklo7

From what I've read the purple chest is suppose to give you a skin shard for a champion that you have owned.
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4c9eou/the_first_purple_chest_from_hextech_in_a_smurf/

replies.body:
The First-Day or *Day-one* chest is intended to give you a skin shard for a champ you own. I took a look at your account and it looks like you should have received a random skin shard for Rek'Sai, a ward skin shard, and enough essence to unlock one of them, as per [this post](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/hextech-crafting-now-live-na). I recommend reaching out to our game team in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can correct this for you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
What is the Day-One chest? I have never heard of it before?
